import React from 'react' // import top2 from '../components/Img/top2.png' // import top3 from '../components/Img/top3.png' import bg from '../components/Img/clg1.png' function AcadCordinator() { const CoordinatorList = [ { Name: "Dr. Geeta Sikha", Photo: "https://www.nitj.ac.in/images/faculty/20071962443.jpg", Phone: "", Email: "", Insta: "", Linkdein: "" }, { Name: "Dr. AmritPal Singh", Photo: "https://www.nitj.ac.in/images/faculty/21010923445.jpg", Phone: "", Email: "", Insta: "", Linkdein: "" }, { Name: "Dr. K P Sharma", Photo: "https://www.nitj.ac.in/images/faculty/22020989592.jpg", Phone: "", Email: "", Insta: "", Linkdein: "" }, { Name: "Dr. Kuldeep Kumar", Photo: "https://www.nitj.ac.in/images/faculty/18012437847.jpg", Phone: "", Email: "", Insta: "", Linkdein: "" }, { Name: "Dr. Prashant Kumar", Photo: "https://www.nitj.ac.in/images/faculty/20112211529.jpg", Phone: "", Email: "", Insta: "", Linkdein: "" }, { Name: "Dr. Rajneesh Rani", Photo: "https://www.nitj.ac.in/images/faculty/22012989244.jpg", Phone: "", Email: "", Insta: "", Linkdein: "" }, ] return ( <>

Academic Coordinator

{ CoordinatorList.map((item, i) => { return (

{item.Name}

Assistant Professor

) }) }
) } export default AcadCordinator
